Posts.Content: Alysecara wrote: My Mom has BC in liver and doctors are recommending her to try SIR-Spheres.  She is been on chemo for  a year and 3 months and her body needs a break, but liver is active.  We know has a 70-30 success rate in Colon cancer in liver, but not much info for breast cancer. I'm new to the blog, I would love any info that can be shared or other ideas for liver met Thanks so much, Alyse Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: met to liver, SiR-Spheres Alysecara luvtotravel
